info.description: OncoKB, a comprehensive and curated precision oncology knowledge base, offers oncologists detailed, evidence-based information about individual somatic mutations and structural alterations present in patient tumors with the goal of supporting optimal treatment decisions.
info.title: OncoKB APIs

tags.name: info-api-controller
tags.description: This includes all OncoKB general information

400.description: Error, error message will be given.

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation.

parameters.name: tumorType
parameters.description: Tumor type name. OncoTree code is supported.

parameters.name: consequence
parameters.description: Consequence. Possible value: feature_truncation, frameshift_variant, inframe_deletion, inframe_insertion, start_lost, missense_variant, splice_region_variant, stop_gained, synonymous_variant

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Tumor type source. OncoTree tumor types are the default setting. We may have customized version, like Quest.

parameters.name: levelOfEvidence
parameters.description: Separate by comma. LEVEL_1, LEVEL_2A, LEVEL_2B, LEVEL_3A, LEVEL_3B, LEVEL_4, LEVEL_R1, LEVEL_R2, LEVEL_R3

parameters.name: evidenceTypes
parameters.description: Separate by comma. Evidence type includes GENE_SUMMARY, GENE_BACKGROUND, MUTATION_SUMMARY, ONCOGENIC, MUTATION_EFFECT, VUS, PROGNOSTIC_IMPLICATION, DIAGNOSTIC_IMPLICATION, TUMOR_TYPE_SUMMARY, STANDARD_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_FOR_DRUG_SENSITIVITY, STANDARD_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_FOR_DRUG_RESISTANCE, INVESTIGATIONAL_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_DRUG_SENSITIVITY, INVESTIGATIONAL_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_DRUG_RESISTANCE

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of queries. Please see swagger.json for request body format. Please use JSON string.

400.description: Error, error message will be given.

get.description: Get list of currently curated genes.

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation. (Deprecated, use query instead)

parameters.name: entrezGeneId
parameters.description: The entrez gene ID. (Deprecated, use query instead)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query, it could be hugoSymbol or entrezGeneId.

get.description: Get list of evidences for specific gene.

parameters.name: evidenceTypes
parameters.description: Separate by comma. Evidence type includes GENE_SUMMARY, GENE_BACKGROUND

get.description: Get list of variants for specific gene.

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation.

parameters.name: tumorType
parameters.description: Tumor type name. OncoTree code is supported.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Tumor type source. OncoTree tumor types are the default setting. We may have customized version, like Quest.

parameters.name: highestLevelOnly
parameters.description: Only show treatments of highest level

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: Query type. There maybe slight differences between different query types. Currently support web or regular.

parameters.name: hgvs
parameters.description: HGVS varaint. Its priority is higher than entrezGeneId/hugoSymbol + variant combination

400.description: Error, error message will be given.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of queries. Please see swagger.json for request body format.

400.description: Error, error message will be given.

get.description: Get All Actionable Variants in text file.
Get All Annotated Variants in text file.
Get cancer gene list in text file.

parameters.name: entrezGeneId
parameters.description: The entrez gene ID. entrezGeneId is prioritize than hugoSymbol if both parameters have been defined

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation.

parameters.name: hgvs
parameters.description: HGVS varaint. Its priority is higher than entrezGeneId/hugoSymbol + variant combination

children.description: List of all available children tumor types.

code.description: Unique identifier representing OncoTree tumor types.

deprecated.description: The indicater whether this code has been deprecated.

id.description: the numarical identifier of tumor type.

tissue.description: The tissue this tumor type belongs to.

id.description: the numarical identifier of tumor type.
